Warm Space+ at Ruskington Methodist Church

properties.address: The Old School House, Lincolnshire NG34 9DY
properties.description: All Saints Ruskington remains committed to providing a space where the community can gather during term time. Warm Spaces It is run by church volunteers where we offer a place of welcome and warmth for all ages. Come and join us for conversation, coffee and crumpets or tea, toast to be listened to and to talk! If you are a crafter, come along and join us we are always making something!! Thank you to everyone who is taking part whether you are being served or serving
properties.title: Warm Spaces

properties.address: Church of the Ascension Church Hall Edinburgh Road, Grantham, Lincolnshire NG31 9QZ
properties.description: Wellbeing Café is for anyone. Baby & Toddler Group is for parents, carers and children under 5. Monday morning 10am-12noon Wellbeing Café with tea, coffee, cake, crafts and table games. FREE. Tuesday morning 10am-12noon Baby & Toddler Group with refreshments and healthy snacks for children. FREE
